general_advisory: Complete earthing up in rabi crops. Due to weather there is chances of powdery mildew in various crops, to manage spray sulphur powder @ 1 kg in 200 liters of water.

advisory: Survey for stem borer attack. Keep light standing water in the nursery.
Provide critical stage irrigation at jointing stage.
Due to weather, there is chances of Pod borer attack, to manage this spray Chlorpyriphos @ 2 ml per liter of water.
At 40 DAS apply 6 kg Nitrogen per acre. Apply fertilizer at a distance of 3-4 inch from the plant.
To control Aphids spray Neem oil @ 4 ml per liter of water.
Due to weather there is Leaf spot, to manage spray Vitavax powder @ 2 g per liter of water
Choose quality seeds like Dharani, Kalinga badam, Kadri, AK 12-24 and start sowing. Apply Gypsum @ 100 kg per acre at final land preparation.
If acidity is less than 7.5 in fish pond 7 days before application of organic fertilizers, apply 100 kg of lime per hectare meter of water.
Cover the hen house with plastic or sacking at night to protect the hens from the cold. Run the heater if necessary.
